hero.title: Join the Smart Loyalty Experience
hero.description: Power automation, collect and track rewards seamlessly. Transform your customer experience with our innovative loyalty platform.

purchase.title: Purchase
purchase.description: Automated points, loyalty tracking and secure transactions. Manage your rewards effortlessly.

earnPoints.title: Earn points
earnPoints.description: Digital rewards and vouchers for memorable experiences. Collect points with every purchase.

trustSupport.title: Trust & Support
trustSupport.description: Earn rewards daily, points and support for cafes & restaurants. Build lasting customer relationships.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the perfect plan for your restaurant. All plans include a 14-day free trial.

about.title: About nux
about.subtitle: Empowering restaurants with intelligent loyalty solutions

story.p1: nux was founded with a clear mission: to transform how restaurants engage with their customers through innovative loyalty programs.
story.p2: Our platform provides restaurants with automated loyalty management, QR code solutions, customer analytics, and comprehensive tools.
story.p3: We are dedicated to helping restaurants succeed by providing technology that is powerful and easy to use.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To revolutionize restaurant loyalty programs by providing innovative, automated solutions.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the leading platform for restaurant loyalty management.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We are committed to delivering top-quality solutions.

qrCodes.title: QR Code Management
qrCodes.description: Generate and manage QR codes for drinks, meals, and menu viewing.

analytics.title: Customer Analytics
analytics.description: Track customer behavior and make data-driven decisions.

loyalty.title: Loyalty Programs
loyalty.description: Create automated loyalty programs with points and rewards.

packages.title: Package Management
packages.description: Create packages and promotions to attract customers.

payments.title: Payment Tracking
payments.description: Monitor payments and manage revenue streams.

mobile.title: Mobile-Friendly
mobile.description: Manage your restaurant from any device.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Get assistance whenever you need it.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team

form.title: Send Us a Message
form.description: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you.

form.subject: Subject
form.submitMessage: Thank you! We'll get back to you soon.
